summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 4639 lux), cloud levels (up 563 m), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1493 m), light levels (up 6935 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 563.1m lower than yesterday, 1059.0m lower than past week, 1493.1m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 860m minimum and 3110m maximum, with an average of 1310.2m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2370m and 2800m.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, very clammy and humid. Possible light showers, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and bright intervals likely. Weather could become unsettled.
